revision.text:
{{codepointer|Special action}} {{doomwiki|A_BrainDie}} '''A_BrainDie'''
(no parameters)
Exits the level if not in deathmatch mode.
== Examples == This example is taken from Doom's [[Classes:BossBrain|Icon of Sin]].
Death: BBRN A 100 [[A_BrainScream]] BBRN AA 10 BBRN A -1 '''A_BrainDie''' Stop [[Category:Icon of Sin]]
